MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH47 postcode area of Whitburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.20pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the The Town Council off Whitburn substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 00.30. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20pm on Wednesday, 17 February 2021
